items.title: 2 dead and 58 sick from growing Legionnaires' disease cluster in New York City
items.description: Two people have died and at least 58 people have been diagnosed with Legionnairesâ€™ disease in a cluster that broke out in New York City last week.

items.title: Texas governor orders police to find and arrest Democrats who fled over redistricting
items.description: Texas Republican Gov. Greg Abbott said he ordered the Texas Department of Public Safety to find and arrest the Democrats who fled the state over redis...

items.title: WATCH:  'We saw a human skeleton,' brother of hostage Evyatar David says
items.description: ABC News' Ian Pannell spoke to the brother of Evyatar David, an Israeli hostage seen in footage released by Hamas over the weekend.

items.title: WATCH:  2 dead, 6 injured in shooting following festival after-party in LA
items.description: Two people were killed and six others were injured in a mass shooting at an apparent after-party in downtown Los Angeles, authorities said.

items.title: WATCH:  Pilot rescued after making an emergency landing in the ocean in Oak Island, N.C.
items.description: A pilot was rescued after his small plane crashed in the water off the coast of Oak Island, North Carolina on Saturday.
